sentences.sentence: For some, however, marginality was more than a mere circumstance; it was a way of life.
sentences.translation: 对一些人而言，边缘并不只是环境，这是一种生活方式。

sentences.sentence: It is not only a technical problem but also an attribute problem of non-technique intervention with technical and legal marginality.
sentences.translation: 其既是一个技术性问题，也是一个含有技术边缘性、法律边缘性的“非技术介入”的属性问题。

sentences.sentence: The writer mainly focuses on the man-made environment with little description of the natural scenery, which indicates the marginality of nature.
sentences.translation: 在该作品中，德里罗对人造环境浓墨重彩，对自然环境只作了极少的描写，反映了自然的边缘状态。
